mapper.insert: insert into nuc_dida_login (id, number, password, gmt_create, gmt_modified) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select id, number, password, gmt_create, gmt_modified from nuc_dida_login
